page.title: 11The Arts In Whitby.
page.content: The Arts are well catered for in Whitby.There is an annual{Competitive {Tournament of Folk Dance and Song,}as well as a{Festival Fortnight,} comprising local talent.The town is proud of its own Spa Theatre and Pavillion which plays host to the{ {Amateur Dramatic and Operatic {Societies. A full scale pantomime is produced annually.A professional touring company comes to the town for the summer season.The{Whitby Literary and {Philosphical Society}meet at the{ {Pannet Park Museum} where much of Whitby's history is stored.The{Art {Gallery}mounts exhibitions of local artists' work. A wind band has recently formed and there are several Rock, Jazz and Country groups who provide entertainment in the area.
